alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson and Rockcastle Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gum Sulphur to Hiatt to Hansford. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hiatt, Lake Linville and Gum Sulphur around 550 PM EDT. Roundstone around 555 PM EDT. Snider, Conway, Muellersville, Flat Rock, Orlando, Renfro Valley, Pine Hill, Sinks, Withers and Donaro around 600 PM EDT. Mount Vernon, Boone, Hummel, Wildie, Dudley Station, Cooksburg and Robinet around 605 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bummer, Johnetta, Goochland, Loam, Climax, Disputanta, Threelinks, Eglon, Morrill, Clover Bottom, Sandgap, Collingsworth, Shirley and Kerby Knob. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
